title: "BNET selects SAP to implement AWS cloud ERP"
excerpt: "Bahrainian national broadband company BNET has selected SAP to implement cloud-based ERP based on Amazon Web Services (AWS). BNET said SAP's S/4 HANA (high-performance analytic appliance) products are compatible with its requirements for artificial intelligence, process automation, data analytics and the flexibility of cloud-based services."
